NamedNodeMapItem.summary:
The item() method of the interface
returns the item in the map matching the index.

blockquote.para:
This method is also called when you use the operator [] syntax.
So, myMap[i] is equivalent to myMap.item(i) where i is a number.

NamedNodeMapItem.returns:
An or null if the number is greater than or equal to the length of
the map.
